hp.Label: Hit Points
hp.Hint: The number of hit points the actor has.

atk.Label: Attack
atk.Hint: The attack bonus of the actor.

def.Label: Defense
def.Hint: The defense bonus of the actor.

spa.Label: Special Attack
spa.Hint: The special attack bonus of the actor.

spd.Label: Special Defense
spd.Hint: The special defense bonus of the actor.

Slug.Label: Slug
Slug.Hint: The slug is a unique identifier for the actor and is used in the URL of the actor's sheet.

Description.Label: Description
Description.Hint: A brief description of the effect.

Container.Label: Container
Container.Hint: The container item in which this item is stored
